name: Bengals
description:
Bengals is an arcade game, the objective is to make the most points before running out of opportunities. The game simulates a play in a football, in which the receiver catches a touchdown pass.

The game has very simple mechanics, as you earn points and complete passes, the receiver will start to run faster, increasing the difficulty. The player can modify and adjust the speed of the pass using the keys (+, -), this will help in certain circumstances to complete passes more accurately.

Once you run out of opportunities you can restart looking to improve your own record over and over again.
